original_text: But maybe you need to know how to be wise. Then ask God to help you. He is ready to give everyone what they need. And he never says that it is wrong to ask. So God will help you to be wise.
korean_text: 너희 중에 누구든지 지혜가 부족하거든 모든 사람에게 후히 주시고 꾸짖지 아니하시는 하나님께 구하라 그리하면 주시리라

sentences.original_text: But maybe you need to know how to be wise
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어쩌면 당신은 현명해지는 방법을 알아야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then ask God to help you
He is ready to give everyone what they need
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모든 사람에게 필요한 것을 주실 준비가 되어 있습니다

sentences.original_text: And he never says that it is wrong to ask
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 구하는 것이 잘못되었다고 절대 말씀하지 않으십니다

sentences.original_text: So God will help you to be wise
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님은 당신이 현명해지도록 도와주실 것입니다
